results.title: A Rare Case Of Berardinelli Seip Syndrome.
results.text_hl: A Rare Case Of @<m>DISEASE_Lipodystrophy_Congenital_Generalized</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D052497 @@@Berardinelli Seip Syndrome@@@.

citations.NLM: Bibi S, Balti D, Mohammad K, Iqbal A, Gillani S, Siddiqui TS, Babar G, Hussain Gilani SY. A Rare Case Of Berardinelli Seip Syndrome. J Ayub Med Coll Abbottabad. 2020 Oct-Dec;32(4):577-579. PMID: 33225669

results.title: Successful long-term use of pioglitazone in Berardinelli-Seip lipodystrophy-associated diabetes
results.text_hl: To the best of our knowledge, this is the first described case report of a @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Lipodystrophy_Congenital_Generalized</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D052497 @@@BSCL type 2@@@ treated with @CHEMICAL_Pioglitazone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077205 @@@pioglitazone@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ for a long period of time (over 5 years), with good metabolic control.

citations.NLM: Chaves C, Chaves M, Anselmo J, César R. Successful long-term use of pioglitazone in Berardinelli-Seip lipodystrophy-associated diabetes Endocrinol Diabetes Metab Case Rep. 2021 Apr 1;2021():. PMID: 33880995
citations.BibTeX: @article{33880995, title={Successful long-term use of pioglitazone in Berardinelli-Seip lipodystrophy-associated diabetes}, author={Chaves C and Chaves M and Anselmo J and César R}, journal={Endocrinol Diabetes Metab Case Rep}, volume={2021}}

results.title: [Multiple subcutaneous nodules for 46 days in an infant aged 66 days].
results.journal: Zhongguo Dang Dai Er Ke Za Zhi
results.text_hl: The boy was diagnosed with @<m>DISEASE_Lipodystrophy_Congenital_Generalized</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D052497 @@@congenital generalized lipodystrophy type 1@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Lipodystrophy_Congenital_Generalized</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D052497 @@@CGL1@@@).

results.title: Lipoatrophic diabetes in an elderly woman: clinical course and serum adipocytokine concentrations.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>DISEASE_Lipodystrophy_Congenital_Generalized</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D052497 @@@Generalized lipodystrophy@@@ is a rare disorder of adipose tissue, whose etiology remains unknown.

citations.NLM: Iglesias P, Alvarez Fidalgo P, Codoceo R, Díez JJ. Lipoatrophic diabetes in an elderly woman: clinical course and serum adipocytokine concentrations. Endocr J. 2004 Jun;51(3):279-86. PMID: 15256772
